name: Annie Mae
comment: Very knowledgeable friendly and straight to the point. He take as much time as needed to make sure you understand everything.

name: Staci Mount
comment: I had to make the difficult decision to file bankruptcy. After speaking with him I realized it was best if I did file.

name: Anitra Dial
comment: I am writing this recommendation as a humble note of appreciation and positive feedback for the outstanding customer service received from him.

name: Terry Hilyer
comment: This guy has made a bad situation not seem so bad. He was always real fast response with giving you what you need.
